>
[Pocket Stage](/Equipment.aspx?ID=367)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 596 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 138 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This item appears to be a miniature replica of a theater. It includes a small pocket full of minute set dressing and costumed paper dolls.
